narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Southwest Center for Independent Living is a Case Manager/Care Coordinator provider based in Springfield, MO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $45.3M in Medicaid payments across 766K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $45.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
